description.en: BrillianceX is focused on exploration, production, and marketing of precious stones (diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and emeralds) and precious metals in SE Asia. BrillianceX has identified and begun work on several very high value gold and diamond projects that when fully developed will bring great value to BrillianceX holders. BrillianceX is also developing a collection of NFTs - The Brilliance Collection - which can be purchased with BrillianceX and other cryptocurrencies. This collection consists of the world's most beautiful stones, which are not available to the general public.
